sentences.cn: 红色印花外套,配上低胸丝质的皇家蓝紫过膝中裙绝对是你参加时尚派对的完美着装.

sentences.en: A red print halter top lowa silky, royal blue - and - purple, above - the - knee sheath dress are party - perfect options.
sentences.cn: 红色印花外套, 配上低胸丝质的皇家蓝紫过膝中裙绝对是你参加时尚派对的完美著装.

sentences.en: After a collar comes a halter.
sentences.cn: 先来些甜头,再给些苦头.

sentences.en: An old thief desire a new halter.
He has made a halter to hang himself.
sentences.cn: 自己做绳索来吊死自己;自作自受.

sentences.en: He put a halter on the horse.
Mention not a halter in the house of him that was hanged.
sentences.cn: [谚]在有人被吊死的人家,千万别谈起绳子;别提起人家忌讳的东西.

sentences.en: Mention not halter in the house of him that was hanged.
sentences.cn: 在有人被吊死的人家,千万别谈起绳子;别提起人家忌讳的东西.

sentences.en: Name not a halter in his house that hanged himself.
sentences.cn: (谚语)房里有人吊死,千万别提绳子.

sentences.en: She was dressed in a halter top and shorts.
sentences.cn: 她穿着三角背心和短裤。

sentences.en: To a greedy eating horse a short halter.
Two colored boys walk by , leading a mule by the halter.
sentences.cn: 两个黑人小伙子牵着一头驴子走过.

sentences.en: We must lead an ox by the halter.
When the man saw this he put a halter on the ass at once, and gave him back to his owner.
sentences.cn: 当这个男人看到这个情景后，他立刻把缰绳套在驴上，把它还给了它的主人。

sentences.en: Win the mare or lose the halter.

trans.tran_cn: （马的）笼头，缰绳，（女用的在颈和背后系带的）袒肩露背上装
trans.tran_en: a rope or leather band that fastens around a horse’s head, usually used to lead the horse
